html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03582023-04-20TC
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectOrder forming a single merged entity operating under the name Canadian North
PrecisOrder varying the Terms and Conditions set out in the annexed schedule to Order in Council 2019-805, which authorized the acquisition and merger of Canadian North Inc. by Bradley Air Services (doing business as First Air) in order to form a single merged entity, operating under the name Canadian North.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order forming a single merged entity operating under the name Canadian North
precis: Order varying the Terms and Conditions set out in the annexed schedule to Order in Council 2019-805, which authorized the acquisition and merger of Canadian North Inc. by Bradley Air Services (doing business as First Air) in order to form a single merged entity, operating under the name Canadian North.
